prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If candidates are provided, you MUST choose one of them (even if it slightly overshoots quantity) and justify the pick—never return null when at least one candidate exists.
        Only when no candidates are supplied may you set `selected_product_id` to null, and those notes must begin with `MISSING_SKU:` so the pipeline can flag the meal for removal.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_FAM_ASIA_UNDER15_01",
  "name": "Family 15‑Minute Stir‑Fry & Noodle Nights (Chinese/Japanese/Korean)",
  "core_tags": {

      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],

      "Chinese",
      "Japanese",
      "Korean"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "NoHeat",
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "SemiPrepared"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "12-Minute Beef & Broccoli Ramen Stir-Fry",
  "description": "Quick, mild noodle stir-fry with tender beef, broccoli, and a glossy soy–oyster sauce. Family-friendly and fast for busy weeknights.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Thinly slice the beef sirloin steak against the grain.",
    "Cut broccoli into small bite-size florets if needed; slice spring onion; mince garlic.",
    "In a bowl, whisk soy sauce, oyster sauce, rice vinegar, brown sugar, bone broth, and cornflour until smooth.",
    "Bring a pot of water to a boil for the ramen noodles."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Boil ramen noodles until just tender (about 2–3 minutes); drain and set aside.",
    "Heat canola oil in a large pan or wok over high heat.",
    "Stir-fry beef in a single layer until just browned (1–2 minutes).",
    "Add garlic and spring onion; toss for 30 seconds until fragrant.",
    "Add broccoli and stir-fry vegetables; cook 2–3 minutes until crisp-tender.",
    "Stir the sauce and pour into the pan; simmer 30–60 seconds until glossy.",
    "Add cooked ramen noodles; toss to coat. Drizzle sesame oil, toss, and serve."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "beef sirloin steak",
      "quantity": "400 g",
      "preparation": "thinly sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "ramen noodles",
      "quantity": "340 g (about 12 oz)",
      "preparation": "boiled and drained"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "broccoli",
      "quantity": "2 cups",
      "preparation": "small florets"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "stir-fry vegetables",
      "quantity": "3 cups",
      "preparation": "ready to use"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spring onion",
      "quantity": "4 stalks",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {

    },
    {

      "quantity": "2 tablespoons",

    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "soy sauce",
      "quantity": "3 tablespoons",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "oyster sauce",

    {

      "preparation": ""
    },
    {

      "preparation": "whisked into the sauce"
    },
    {

    }
  ],
        ```
